response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this item at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to reflect the substantial worth the product holds for you, while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
